description: This header file declares external API functions for Object Container management within the ANSC framework. It provides prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling, initializing, engaging, and canceling object containers, focusing on external interactions and object lifecycle management.

methods.name: AnscCreateObjectContainer
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new object container with provided context handles.

methods.name: AnscOcoCreate
methods.description: Creates an Object Container instance with specified contexts.

methods.name: AnscOcoRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the specified Object Container instance.

methods.name: AnscOcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls or registers objects within the container.

methods.name: AnscOcoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Object Container to a ready state.

methods.name: AnscOcoEngage
methods.description: Engages or activates the Object Container for operation.

methods.name: AnscOcoCancel
methods.description: Cancels or deactivates the Object Container.

methods.name: AnscOcoSubEngage
methods.description: Performs sub-engagement or nested activation of the container.

methods.name: AnscOcoSubCancel
methods.description: Performs sub-cancellation or nested deactivation of the container.
